rolling_events.name: Vibretto
rolling_events.description: A four-round, music-themed event featuring song guessing, lyric recall, and Pictionary challenges promoting teamwork.

rolling_events.name: Meme & Reel Contest
rolling_events.description: Online Instagram contest celebrating humor and creativity through original memes and short reels.

rolling_events.name: கருத்தரங்கம் (Karutharangam).
rolling_events.description: Tamil discussion-based event promoting respectful debates, expressive language, and clarity of thought. Tamil

rolling_events.name: Plot Twist Paradox
rolling_events.description: A literary crossover challenge where participants merge plots or characters from different worlds with creativity and humor.
